mapper.update: update augustdb_route set cityID = #{cityid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, provinceID = #{provinceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, routeName = #{routename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, startProvince = #{startprovince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, startCity = #{startcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, endProvince = #{endprovince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, endCity = #{endcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, midProvince = #{midprovince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, midCity = #{midcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, transportPrice = #{transportprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, Comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where routeID = #{routeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select routeID, cityID, provinceID, routeName, startProvince, startCity, endProvince, endCity, midProvince, midCity, transportPrice, Comment from augustdb_route where routeID = #{routeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select routeID, cityID, provinceID, routeName, startProvince, startCity, endProvince, endCity, midProvince, midCity, transportPrice, Comment from augustdb_route
